title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-8.3 - Preferred provider organization providers' responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-8.3 - Preferred provider organization providers' responsibilities

State Regulations

Preferred provider organization providers must submit
full and truthful reports of their findings to the employer and the board. Providers who improperly alter or edit their reports or otherwise misrepresent
their findings to the employer or the board will have their authorization
revoked by the chair in accordance with sections
13-d, 13-k, 13-l
and
13-m
of the Workers' Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-8.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
